website_summaries.verdict: Take extra caution when ordering your pooch's size. However, once you find one that fits, we think you'll be impressed with the features and quality it has to offer.
pros: Ideal for owners of larger dogs, as it comes in sizes from medium to XXXL
Provides excellent coverage and is easy to adjust for a comfortable fit
Back pocket comes in handy for stowing treats or other small gear
cons: Finding the right size can be a bit challenging
Although the material is durable, the leash opening is prone to tearing

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Raincoat
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this raincoat was better then I expected. The fabric was sturdy. It was easy to get on and had elastic that went over the hind legs to secure it. I put our blue harness over it. It does have a leash opening that can be used. I also love the pocket. The hood could be a little bigger as its a little challenging to keep on although it does have a drawstring. Overall very satisfied. I ordered a Size XXL for my 85 lb German Shepard.
customer_reviews.author: Gin

customer_reviews.title: Nice raincoat for our rain averse pit bull
customer_reviews.text: Our pit bull doesn't like to get wet, so we got this raincoat to see if he'd tolerate going outside in the rain. The raincoat works for him. He stands still while it is being put on and when taking it off. He is much more comfortable going outside when raining. He still doesn't like the rain, but he does his business without freaking out. Should have bought one years ago. Now, for the only negatives. Our pit bull has XL sized neck and chest which makes the coat a bit too long and loose around the hindquarters. And he doesn't tolerate the hood. Still, I give the raincoat 5 stars for the negatives aren't showstoppers.
customer_reviews.author: JWH

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my dog Shane nice and dry in heavy rain.
customer_reviews.text: My service dog Shane really loves his raincoat. It keeps him well protected from the elements. The material is made up of a rubbery fabric type blend which seems to resist tears and scrapes. The only problem that I have is that the hood tends to slide down when he shakes his head. This is not a major problem but something that could be addressed in future designs.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing material great fit
customer_reviews.text: Just received today quality material and it fits great. I recommend doing measurements first, I would have ordered a medium if I hadn’t measured first but the extra large is a perfect fit for my boxer. In the pics I don’t have the chest strap as snug as it could go. It does fit snugly when I tighten it. I was more concerned with the length when trying it on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 42 lb golden doodle. She doesn’t like things on her head so we don’t use the hood. The strap that secured the jacket around her chest is nice. There’s a strange elastic band toward the back of the jacket that doesn’t make sense. I think I goes around a leg to secure the back of the coat in place but just seems awkward. For now I don’t Secure the back so it does shift a bit. I’ll add a Velcro strip for the back. I love the hole in the top to attach her leash to her harness on underneath the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect Sizing Chart and unpaid shipping back to China
customer_reviews.text: Using the size chart on the website I measured my dog and according to their measurements I needed to order an XL which was incorrect and the size I really needed was a L. The sizing chart doesn’t reflect the correct size of the item. When I went to return it and order the correct one I was given a shipping label and expected to pay postage myself to an address in China. This was purchased using Prime. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kunin

customer_reviews.title: Nice raincoat
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the sizing guide (maybe I just measured incorrectly) , so I got a 2XL for my 85lb shepherd mix. The chest strap was very long, but that took all of 2 minutes to fix. The rest of the dimensions are fine and now don't have a wet dog.
customer_reviews.author: ckuethe

customer_reviews.title: Literally measure your dog!
customer_reviews.text: My rhodesian ridgeback mix hates rain. I bought him an extra large. I used the size chart to pick his size. The XL fit his length and gave him an extra inch of room around his chest. That doesn’t impede any function. The first time I tried it on him, he didn’t love it and tried pulling at it with his teeth. Today it was raining and he seemed to appreciate it. At first he seemed nervous about doing his business, but he quickly got use to it. I placed his hind legs in the elastic straps and once his leash was attached through the slot to his collar there was no issue with it sliding off of him.
customer_reviews.author: Jeneane

customer_reviews.title: Neck too tight
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have bought the XL but I went by the recommendations. My dog is a Shepherd mix and weighs 95 lbs. It does go over his head, but the hole for the leash is tight and too far forward. When you walk him, it pulls and after 2 walks it tore the stitching. With his big ears he can't wear the hood either. (too tight). It tends to slip and slide on his body when he walks. I was constantly having to pull on it. Should have sent it back but I didn't....not knowing if it was my dog's size or the raincoat. Darn!
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Leash hole doesn't hold
customer_reviews.text: I like the heavy duty quality of the raincoat and the straps for the back legs, a feature our previous raincoat did not have. However, we've had this raincoat since the first of November and have only used it four times. The hole for the leash to hook up with the collar ripped on the seam making it useless in the rain and he arrived at home much wetter than expected. The design is faulty and the hole is too far down the back to match up with the collar. It needs to go back for redesign. If I could return this I would.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn L. Knepp

customer_reviews.title: Great rain gear.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic rain gear for my 180 pound Mastiff. Even the largest size is a bit tight on the elastic neck. Also, for dogs as large as a Mastiff, the leash hole assumes a chest harnis, which is unrealistic for such a large dog, only a neck collar works to walk a dog of this size. But the rain coat works great otherwise, and the elastic straps to hold the rear part of the coat is perfect. She automatically lifts her legs to put these in place. Great rain coat.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Reiff

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Good rain coat. I bought my first one about 4 years ago and finally need to replace it because the outer plastic is slowly coming off. For the price, I am very pleased with how this lasted. I walk my pups everyday, rain or shine and they sure appreciate not getting soaked. They also look pretty cute in these matching coats. I do wish this coat had another belly strap for the back end so it wouldn’t slide around so much. While this coat has a couple of flaws, I plan to purchase another in the future.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Potentially DANGEROUS product!
customer_reviews.text: ** Potentially DANGEROUS product ** The first (and last) time my dog wore this jacket, we were on a walk when she comes to a sudden, complete stop mid-stride and refuses to move. I checked to see what was wrong and noticed that the jacket was pulling to one side of her and that the elastic straps had ridden all the way up her crotch and were literally pinching at her private area! This is either a MAJOR design flaw or we got a faulty product, but either way I immediately took the jacket off of my dog and will be returning this crappy product.
customer_reviews.author: Hawks2thesuperbowl

customer_reviews.title: If it's long enough, it's WAY too big
customer_reviews.text: IDK what kind of dog they think will be wearing this, but I ordered one (M) long enough to cover the length of my dog, and I could fit three of her (or one morbidly obese bulldog) in it, girth-wise. The pass-through-and-reverse strap is fiddly, and the velcro is cheap and not well-sewn. I will be re-doing the entire belt anyway, so might as well use decent Velcro and lose the pass-through nonsense. Best I can say is it's probably fairly waterproof and I like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Sagwagon Pilot

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love playing in the rain with these cute rain coats.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on and my dogs who hate going outside when it is raining do not mind with these adorable yellow jackets. They are well made and wipe clean with soap and water. This is a replacement for one that I purchased 5 years ago from Paetco and this one is just a well made and half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Spanktheguitar

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. We got it for our service dog during rainy days and it works like a charm. The material its made of is surprisingly hearty and the open bottom design and elastic neck hole makes donning and doffing hastle free. It also has nice elastic loops to fit around your pups back legs so that the wind doesn't lift the rear flap up. The reflective tape is also very bright so walking in dark parking lots or early in the morning around the neighborhood is much less stressful. The only way I would improve this product is to add velcro patches to the sides for working dog identification. Otherwise it's all 5 stars/will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: Great quality material. TRUE TO SIZE
customer_reviews.text: I have a rescue pup that has odd proportions and has been hard to find a coat that fits his 33" long back and large barrel chest. Had ordered a similar coat elsewhere, and it was too small. Got this and IT IS GREAT! Very nice strong material, good construction and nice added elastic for around back legs. My dog hates rain and I can do without the wet dog smell... so now we're all set!
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Fit Great for my VERY long golden retriever
customer_reviews.text: Fit Great for my VERY long golden retriever. After the first walk in the rain he got used to the little elastic leg straps that go under his back legs. The velcro strap that goes across his stomach is a little too long for his girth, so the velcro is not really effective. It still works just fine. I'll probably jury rig a better fastner to the strap so that it secures without the velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Theriot

customer_reviews.title: Great raincoat
customer_reviews.text: It's great but I think runs very large. I measured her but her chest is smaller than her length. It's also elasticied around the neck which is great & has elastic band for her back legs to keep it on. I would have ordered a size smaller even though her winter cost is a XXX
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: undersized, XL items in XXXL marked bags
customer_reviews.text: First i bought the XL item per advertised measurements. This is actually smaller than the chart suggest, add two - three inches at least to the back length numbers they advertise in the size chart. Next i ordered XXXL size. Received exact equivalent of XL item (it is even marked as XL) inside an XXXL-marked bag. Ok, possibly an error. So i ordered a replacement for XXXL. Same story, an XL item in XXXL marked bag. Bottom line if you have a large dog, i would be surprised if you find a proper size in vendor offer.
customer_reviews.author: D.L.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best fit
customer_reviews.text: Followed the size guidelines and went with a large. The length was good but the chest/belly strap was too loose. The elastic leg straps ride up so that they are in the way of my dog doing her business. As a work around, I put the chest strap through the leg straps before securing it to help keep the coat from falling off to her side.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: A dry, happy dog!
customer_reviews.text: My dog Truffles has trouble with rain rot and this coat has been great for her! It is very sturdy material and she, surprisingly, loves the hood. We did have a problem with the stitching coming out at the opening for the leash but some reflective duct tape added some flair and fixed the problem! And actually in this dark rainy weather it s a plus. It has been very nice to have a rainy season without trips to the vet for skin problems!
customer_reviews.author: Ida Melloncamp

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a Halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: I only give this a 4⭐️ Due to the elastic on the back legs (to hold the jacket in place) are tight on our pup & if we don’t use them it slides all over the place. wish they were adjustable, but with some minor hand sewing we will make it work. VERY cute jacket & helps get our giant baby outside to potty in the rain 😂. It also was the perfect touch for her Halloween costume! Photoshop was used for the first photo, lol. 💗
customer_reviews.author: MrsBailey

customer_reviews.title: Nice raincoat, but sizing chart may not as accurate.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a cheaper raincoat for my dog and the buttons broke off after only a few months of using it. I like this raincoat a lot more and it's thicker than the other raincoat, so the rain doesn't soak through it. Only problem I have is that I measured my dog's neck and it was within the XXL range, but it seems to be a little bit tighter than I would like on her. Other than that, it's a great coat. It even has straps that you put around the back legs to keep the jacket from sliding to one side.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sizing!
customer_reviews.text: I think this rain coat is great for my boy! I ordered an XXL for my 77 pound Shepard mix and I think it fits in perfectly. The XL might have been ok but he has a large chest and torso so the XXL Velcro strap around the belly was perfect in the XXL and I’m glad it’s a little long because then it’ll keep his whole body dry. The hood is also perfect as it isn’t super tight at all but is more form fitting/made for the shape of a dogs head. His measurements are 34 in chest/27 in back length. Seems like a nice quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Badly made, seams will break right away.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it. Within five minutes of putting it on my dog and starting our walk the hood (at the collar) seam completely ripped, by just using it. I have a friend who has the same one, it also tore at the same spot, I thought that it happened over time when I asked her about it, she said that it ripped the first time she used it. Do not buy, it will fall apart. The material is nice and the fit was good but really poorly sewn.
customer_reviews.author: Donald B. Lane

customer_reviews.title: It is adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't mind being in the rain when he had this on.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Great rain coat
customer_reviews.text: I love this rain coat and it looks great on my dog but sad to he will not go potty with it on. The coat does what it is supposed to do which is keep my very furry dog dry in the rain. I will keep trying and hope he will one day get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Standard Poodles. I live in WA, where it rains a lot and grooming poodles is hard work. This keeps them mostly dry, though the hood won’t stay on. But the body stays dry, it easy to put on and take off, and I was surprisedis how well it is made. Very good quality, especially for that price!
customer_reviews.author: Sabine P

customer_reviews.title: Keeps fur baby dry
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! I ordered a large for my pit mix.. he’s 87 lbs and there’s a little wriggle room. He has his harness on underneath and we pull the loop for the leash through the hole in the back of the coat and have no problems with it on our walks. There are little straps that go on the legs in the back to keep his tail from moving the coat. Great design and quality. Keeps him dry. Definitely recommend if you want to keep your pup dry on drizzle walks!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit and smells like rubber
customer_reviews.text: my dog and I both hate the smell of this rain jacket. I tried washing it away but it is permanent. Smells like a mixture of rubber, plastic, and silicone. Also, don't get the large size, doesn't even fit my medium sized dog
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Cute as a button
customer_reviews.text: Prefect for for my 90 lbs huge chested GSD. This was the ONLY one that has fit him! Pocket is totally useless but it keeps the rain off and he's kind of adorable in his dog shame. The neck isn't too tight but is snug but he's a beast so 🤷‍♀️.
customer_reviews.author: Lutzy

customer_reviews.title: Neck too short for a large dog
customer_reviews.text: This is marketed for a large dog. Unfortunately the neck is too short and therefore does not cover over the top of the dogs head. As the dog walks it slowly rides back on his neck bothering him or her and eventually you just need to pull it all the way back. It simply won’t stay over the top of their eyes. I have an 80 pound yellow lab which is not a very large dog for that breed. And this ends up being too small for him
customer_reviews.author: Sam Snead

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Violet (our lab) is in love with her new raincoat! The feature we like the best is that there is an enclosed hole for the head/hood. Our other raincoat the hood/head area and front shoulder will velcro in place. I feel the enclosed area much like a shirt is more durable and keeps the coat in place better. We sized up 1, only because Violet has a very long body. But I believe it is true to size, so measure and look at the size chart :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachal

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This raincoat does a great job keeping my dog dry! It is a good quality and looks great. That being said, my dog is an odd size because he is a goldendoodle. To get the coat to be long enough it was too big in the chest. I plan to buy some velcro to sew on the strap so I can make it shorter. Also I had to make the leg straps a little longer by adding elastic because it was too small. However, this was the best fit I could find for my dog and the easiest to adjust. It was a great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coat for bigger dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very hard to fit for coats but this coat is great. He’s 100 lbs, on the longer side and has a barrel chest. I had a hard time finding a coat that wasn’t too short bodied for him. I bought him the XXL because of his chest measurements. It is a little long for him but I prefer it that way. It’s not a coat for warmth, just for precipitation. Very easy to put on. It doesn’t get in the way when they do their business. I definitely recommend this coat for bigger dogs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Intoppa

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my daughters dog, whom is afraid of water (yeah; i know). Dog looks adorable in it, but it’s not exactly a good fit. Hood (too small) keeps slipping down to neck and bottom part is loose. Very cute though and should do the job the few times in rains in central Texas. dog is obsessed with dragging aways towels and small blankets, so she tries to drag the rain coat sides but that doesn’t work out well for her lol
customer_reviews.author: mterry5932

customer_reviews.title: My dog hated it, and it did not last a day
customer_reviews.text: My dog's review: - After attempting to put it on, my Doberman had an instant urge to take it off. It has two elastics that go tight on each back leg, and it is too close to the groin area, which was too uncomfortable. - It took one try, for the product to break (see picture). I would not recommend this, even though it "looks pretty", because it is definitely not functional, nor designed thinking about the dogs' comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander de Goeyen

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog raincoat
customer_reviews.text: I’m really impressed with this one. I got a different brand/model for my other dog but they didn’t have a large enough one for my Aussie. This is thick, has a slot for the leash on the back, and a pocket for...phone? I dunno - but it’s a nice addition. It’s easy to put on and the dog isn’t making a fuss about it. Nice to know if we get caught out on our walk that they won’t get stuck waiting in the garage until they’re dry before they can come inside.
customer_reviews.author: Name withheld because stalkers Google me and I find it annoying

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but smaller than regular
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product... but... the "large" is smaller than a regular large and if you want it to fit your "large" dog ... 26" ... you might want to buy the larger size. I didn't want to go thru the hassle of returning, so I will use - but, again - I think the "large" is smaller than a regular "large"...
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: I dont recommend this, esp for a larger dog, even after measuring. its difficult to fasten around the body and one of the elastic straps for the back legs broke right away so the coat kept sliding to one size. just not well designed. if I'm lucky I can get a friend to make new straps so I can use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: the bungee cords that wrap around the dog's hind legs break/wear easily. that said, the center strap around the chest is enough to hold the jacket on properly (even on a dog that pulls alot). just need to occasionally pull the back of jacket down. for the price, it's 5 stars... i've bought jackets for double the money that didn't perform/fit as well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Caballes

customer_reviews.title: SKIP THIS - IT IS HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality material. Lousy quality item - seams ripped on 4th use. The neck opening & hood are FAR TOO SMALL for a large dog and there is no way to adjust. Shipping took ages but that was out of the control of the seller. The item doesn't stay on properly so I tried to return. Item arrived on the 10th, return window ended on the 11th. I am SO unhappy with this experience, and I DO NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Organizationizer

customer_reviews.title: Funny and functional
customer_reviews.text: Dogs in clothes, nothing is better! Seems to be of good quality and has a pocket for my dogs cell phone. A size large was a little small for my 40lb super mut but I'm not returning it. Took away 1 star because the one I received had clearly been "tried on" by another dog and returned. Not a huge deal, they're dogs and don't believe in cooties, but they do believe in fleas and ticks.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: IT FITS!
customer_reviews.text: My German shepherd dog weight 126 lbs. he's huge and this camo raincoat fits him like a glove. Now I don't have to worry about him going out in the rain and getting soaking wet. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Pepperp

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: head hood way too small, front area of coat too wide, elastic straps for rear legs too constraining, velcro strap too short. This dog raincoat was a good idea but design and follow trough surely indicates they never really used a live dog to see if it actually fit. Had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: kavix52

customer_reviews.title: Order a size larger than you think
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd raincoat for our 40 pound labradoodle - the XL didn't fit well, even though the measurements indicated XL. The belt that goes around the belly is WAY too big regardless of the size of the raincoat so that is why I've taken away one star. Otherwise, the raincoat is great for the one time we've used it. Would recommend if you want a way to keep your dog relatively dry in rain.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Great raincoat!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I was going to receive quality wise and was nicely surprised. The material is thick/hefty, and the sewing is well done. T And we love the color!!! There are elastic loops you put around your dogs inner thigh (just loop leg through) that is an awesome extra touch to keep the raincoat in place. And the raincoat offers full coverage for their torso and head. I had to adjust the strap on the belly since I have a hound, so enormous chest and tiny waist (so odd shape), but I think this would fit a normally shaped pup right out if the package.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy design
customer_reviews.text: 3 walks and the raincoat is already tearing near the leash hole. The hole is not reinforced, and hence tears easily. Check the photos.
customer_reviews.author: ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Strap too big, good otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: We live in rainy Eugene, Oregon and our 72 pound Lab gets two walks a day, rain or shine. This rain coat fits well except the chest strap is too big. Surprising, especially since Emma has the typical Lab deep chest. But my wife who is handy with a needle and thread was able shorten the strap. High visibility is a big plus, especially with the time change coming up soon.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Lindros

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. High quality.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is pretty great for the price. It's a tough material and the color is nice and bright. I ordered one sixe up instead of going with what my dogs measures - PERFECT DECISION. This allows more movement for my dog since it is not tight/snug. Also, this ensured the hood was loose enough on my dog's head the he doesn't hate it or freaks out (My dog freaks out with everything *eye roll*) The back has two elastics where the legs go into so the back flap/part of the coat isn't moving around. When the hood is off, it lays nicely scrunched on my dog's neck. Doesn't have that typical nasty plastic smell.
customer_reviews.author: Yahaira S.

customer_reviews.title: Less dog to dry in wet weather - success
customer_reviews.text: This nearly fit my Australian Cattle dog perfectly. He needs the larger size for his chest girth but depending on where the strap falls on your dog it may be a little loose. The nice part for winter is I put his sweater underneath and it all works for warmth and keeping him dry. The elastic straps underneath also help. Best part, only need to dry his paws when him comes in from the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Perry

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is really nice to have right after a grooming, so all the money spent on that doesn't go down the drain. Could be 3 inches lo ger down the back. Bought the suze appropriate for my dog,but, just a little shy down the back. Next size would have been too big.
customer_reviews.author: lil groundhog

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit for 80 pound dog. Head opening is too small. Underbelly strap should be wider. Material is excellent and it is easy to put on after you get the hang of it. Update. elastic that goes around rear legs has torn a hole in the raincoat where it was supposed to be affixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some issues
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good rain poncho. Couple of issues thought. Since there is only one belt that wraps under the doggo’s chest, the poncho has a tendency to slide to one side or another. So I end up adjusting it back to the center often. Also, the neck portion does not stay on his ears for more that a turn of the head. So if dog’s ears are sensitive to humidity, this poncho won’t cover them effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Oxana

customer_reviews.title: It’s adjustable! Almost the perfect size for a mini aussie!
customer_reviews.text: It’s just a tad bit too small length wise, but this one actually covers her whole top back compared to other brands. I like that there are two additional straps to slip her back legs in to keep it in place and not have the jacket sway off. The middle strap and the hood is also adjustable. I bought the medium size for a 21 lb Mini Aussie who stands about 13/14 inches tall at the shoulders, and its almost, almost the perfect fit. Compared to the other raincoat I’ve bought, I definitely prefer this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I brought my dog crab fishing a few weeks ago. We were hit with a couple down pours, but thankfully, we were prepared. This slicker kept my dog dry and happy. He wore it on and off during our 1 week trip and I didn't notice any stresses or tears. I did not use the leash opening because previous reviewers said this is where the coat fails.
customer_reviews.author: Xevil

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, good material
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy material, but lightweight enough to be comfortable. I like that it has both a Velcro strap for under the belly and elastic straps for the back legs to help hold it in place. As I read from others the hood isn’t great at staying up but my dog has a big ol head and that was to be expected. It does still fit him well though. I ordered a large and Gimli is about 65 lbs. He doesn’t mind wearing it at all and it’s seriously adorable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: RUNS BIG, but it's good
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a mixed rescue, he's medium sized and lean, looks very similar to a Basenji, but as tall as a Bull Terrier. According to the size table of the product he would fit a Large, but the Large runs quite big for him. A medium would have fit him correctly. The product's quality is very good though, I hope it lasts a lot.
customer_reviews.author: T. Portelles

customer_reviews.title: Great little rain coat!!
customer_reviews.text: Measured my dog it fits great, I do wish the length was a tad bit longer but still works well keeps him dry. The hood design actually covers his head and ears so that's awesome. Very impressed for the cheap price!! Needed a lightweight rain coat for my dog and this is it. The reflectors are a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Dry dog
customer_reviews.text: I can not believe that I have become a person who buys a dog raincoat, but here I am. I have two large dogs that are therapy dogs and they can not make a visit when they are wet, no one wants to hug on a wet dog. So after weeks of rain, I ordered the coats for my dogs. They work well, I think that they could have used a larger one, the ones that I got are x-large. But I am happy with them, the dogs are happy with them and our clients are happy not to have wet dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Armsey

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble keeping the raincoat in place as she walks. It seems to slip to the side. The hood won't stay back and she doesn't like having her head covered. I've had to shorten the front so she doesn't trip on it. All that being said it is good quality and works best of all the coats I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Abernethy

customer_reviews.title: Cute but didn’t fit properly
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is super cute but unfortunately didn’t fit my pup the way we were hoping. I followed the sizing guide and got a Large. However the hood would not even reach my dog’s head and the back leg straps were a very awkward fit. I may need to size up but then the chest would be too large. The chest piece is also really flappy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: The large fits a 50 lb lab/whippet mix perfectly! She's so adorable in this thing. It kept her dry in a thunderstorm and she doesn't complain about putting it on as it goes right over the head and clips (unlike some other doggy rain jackets that have a weird looking mechanism). Would recommend this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: D J P

customer_reviews.title: Great material but neck hole too small for my pry
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed that this raincoat won't work for my great Pyrenees because it seems to be really good quality, which is exactly what I was looking for. Unfortunately, my big boy's head will not fit comfortably through the neck hole and hood, so I have to return it. I probably should've researched a little more first.
customer_reviews.author: merryberry

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay, the straps on the bottom are way to long to fit the cost snuggly on my golden. The coat slides and shifts on my pup.
customer_reviews.author: krystina

customer_reviews.title: Mostly satisfied. it is a bit shorter in length than ...
customer_reviews.text: Mostly satisfied. it is a bit shorter in length than I had hoed. But, it is very uselful and my dog is much happier not getting wet in the rain. And she looks adorable in it!
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: It was very good to the body of our dog that is Golden ...
customer_reviews.text: It was very good to the body of our dog that is Golden Retrievers, covers enough of his body and is very appropriate when it rains ,we are very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: LINDA from colombia

customer_reviews.title: Best raincoat ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Hreat Dane who normally has to be dragged out into inclement weather to relieve herself. I put this coat on her during a pretty good rain and not only was she happy to go out on her own, she actually ran around the yard having a wonderful time in the rain!! Love this coat!! It’s a perfect fit, extremely durable and easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Diane  Glass

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved, but barely. What do you expect? She’s a pup that wants to roam naked and free.
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic for my pup. The hood doesn’t completely go over for her but that’s not a big deal. There are little loops to put the hind legs through to keep the little poncho in place. She does love to mess with the little laces on the front of her neck so I typically tuck those in.
customer_reviews.author: ARussell

customer_reviews.title: Functional and cute! Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rain jacket for my 85 lb Doberman. He doesn't like the rain and enjoyed playing outside. The fitting is a tad bit long (XXL), but fits on chest, neck, and head. See pictures. Bright yellow color stands out and has reflectors so I can find him in the dark in our backyard. Really cute. Highly recommend if your dog is used to jackets.
customer_reviews.author: RMartinson86

customer_reviews.title: Well made raincoat
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our certified comfort/therapy dogs. WE travel with them to schools for Read to Rover program and to local universities for de-stress after exams. Who wants to cuddle a wet dog?!? We have 85# and 98# English Ccrream Goldens and these LARGE coats fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon Find Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the cutest thing I've ever seen a dog in! Even more, it's a REAL raincoat! So now my dog not only looks ADORABLETM But u also don't have to dry her off when it rains!
customer_reviews.author: Reid Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Service dog approved
customer_reviews.text: Had to find something for my daughters service dog to get in and out of places without getting wet and stinky dog like. This is a perfect raincoat. The dogs head has to go through the top so make sure your dog is ok with that. It’s very think and heavy though. Not easy to store because it’s size is large to put in a purse or bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bridges

customer_reviews.title: We bought this for our Golden, Jack, for ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our Golden, Jack, for RV trips when rain is forecasted. Keeps him dry and our RV too! Only complaint is the neck is a bit snug on our 97lb. dog, otherwise it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: swissmiss

customer_reviews.title: Good quality rain coat for your dog
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight raincoat works great and my 70 lb golden retriever is happy wearing it. I got him an XL but it doesn’t completely cover his butt so I’m thinking of getting him the XXL to give him better protection. It’s made from high quality materials and the rear leg straps stretch for taking them on and off. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CCIGrampaw

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic design and construction.
customer_reviews.text: God I love this thing. It's reflective and stays in place. I might order one size up. My Mutley powers all over the place and this is the first coat that actually stays in Place. The cut is perfect and I used the handy pocket for treats and a ,22 caliber pistol to ward off coyotes. I highly recommend this coat.
customer_reviews.author: Hiroku-hiroku

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful dog raincoat, but huge
customer_reviews.text: I bought the orange raincoat in medium size (the smaller) for my miniature poodle. It's too long for his legs and the strap belt need to be shorted... I am going to cut and sew... But it's a wonderful color and it seems sturdy. I really reccomand this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: simona

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Really like how it attaches to the dog- has a head hole, and some nylon straps to go on the inside of the hips to keep it center on the dog. The nylon straps seem a little weak, but anything bigger would probably annoy the pooch. The coats survived my Bernese mountain dog rolling in the grass with it, so I'd say it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D & Jenny D

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd puppy 7 and half months old is close to 80 pounds... this is size XXL and is a little big not much but that is what I wanted because he is going to grow up more and is going to last longer and maybe until break. This raining coat have a really good quality and my bb looks handsome with .
customer_reviews.author: ashlyescobar

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but just not for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: This is Super cute but just not for my dog. We ordered it so our dog Bailey could go outside even when it's raining our. She loves going outside and with the rainy season she just can't all the time but once we put it on her she just stands there, we even went running down the driveway with her but didn't get to full speed, she just doesn't like it. Very strange because she likes the sweater shirts we've gotten in the past but not this. The hoodie is short and not at full length, there's a Velcro strap underneath and a pocket on top.
customer_reviews.author: jfloyd

customer_reviews.title: High quality material. Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: This raincoat is great! The fabric is sturdy and it was easy to put on. Basically like a doggy tarpaulin! There are elastics on the back legs to keep it in place but they seem to be optional, since the coat stays in place just lying over the dog's back. I ordered a large for my puppy. It has a little room to grow into. The strap on the inside is pretty big, but my dog is skinny and long so it might just be him. If he outgrows this coat, I'm definitely getting another!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable - to an extent
customer_reviews.text: I love this, but I am not a fan of the elasticated neck and hood - or rather our dog isn’t (see photo of shame.) We bought an XXL for our cane corso, managed to get it over his head; the elastic was a little snug on his neck, but the hood wouldn’t go over his whole head.. 4 stars instead of 5 just because the hood wasn’t completely true to size, but the body is absolutely perfect - our dogs head is ridiculously large so other big dogs may not have the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Ginny in her raincoat
customer_reviews.text: My dog weighs about 53 lbs the large fit her well with the leg straps on. Picture with and without it on to give you an idea of the size you may need
customer_reviews.author: Gail Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Hood could be a tad bigger
customer_reviews.text: I bought an XL for my 75lb lab/pit mix and it fits him well. My only issue is he has a big head and the hood is snug.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: The raincoat was made in China.Had I known that I would never have purchased it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the size large according to the posted measurements.The length was fine but it was way too big around.I would have had to pay the postage to return it but it is not worth $95.00 to return it because it has to be shipped to China.Had I received a U.S. Addressed to return it I would have gladly sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Corrine Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage from the rain
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the rain and I like how it covers down to his tail and the sides. Easy on/off too. I purchased an XL and it is a little bit large, I'm thinking about returning and getting a large so the belly band can be velcroed closed..now it goes beyond the area because he is not big enough. everything else is fine.
customer_reviews.author: buybye

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best purchases i have made for my fur baby. This is much higher quality than i expected. Very well made and durable. Covered my dog from head to tail!! Took him out in the pouring rain and all i had to do was dry his paws.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M Culberson

customer_reviews.title: bad design
customer_reviews.text: The coat fits my dog (except for the hood--which isn't the problem I have with this item), but there's a huge design flaw: no straps to secure the coat to the dogs posterior. The back of the coat constantly slides off my dog, so it's useless. The elastic straps don't help because my dog won't let me put them on. Even if he did, I don't see them lasting very long. It seems like a huge oversight that they didn't add a second strap for the posterior.
customer_reviews.author: Evan J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: XXXl Was Not Big Enough For My Saint Bernard
customer_reviews.text: It is made of quality material, stretchy, I loved the color and the reflective straps, and the pocket was so cute! Unfortunately, even after measuring my 130 lb. Saint Bernard, the neck was way too tight for him to walk around with it on & the stretch bands for his hind legs did not reach. I was able to pop his head through, however the fit was cutting it too close for his comfort. He looked absolutely smothered, and because of that I wouldn't reccommend this for Giant Breeds with thicker coats and massive head's. Other than that, if your furbaby is slim figured with a thin coat, this cute rain coat is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Chang

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but leg straps weren’t durable at all and it ran smaller than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I put this on my dog, the leg strap popped from its anchor. I also made sure to measure my dog and the fit was a little misleading. It was a little smaller than I expected. The “hoodie” doesn’t even go halfway over his head. Other than this, it looks cool. I like the reflective lining, adjustable velcro strap for his chest and the handy pouch for poop bags or something useful.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Great Pyrenees Service Dog!
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for days when we have to be out in the rain. Service dog patch fits great on the pocket. My service dog looks adorable, professional and presentable for being out in the public. She’s a Great Pyrenees and wears the largest size.
customer_reviews.author: abkinsey

customer_reviews.title: Water soaks through the rain coat
customer_reviews.text: The raincoat is not water proof. After taking it off my dog their fur was wet and you can see that the water has soaked through the raincoat. I did like that it is easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not just plastic wrap!
customer_reviews.text: This rainwear for your dog is great! We have a dog who will not go out in the rain, even if she is desparate. We have tried several others that we're short, super thin, and ineffective. This one is better quality and she will now go out to do her thing, as needed, even in the rain!
customer_reviews.author: Sallygirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I bought it for my 70lb Labrador and it fits him perfectly. I will post a picture later. The quality of it is equal to that of one you would buy at any pet store. It also has the reflective patches on it so if you are walking your pup at night you will still be able to see them. :)
customer_reviews.author: Tania Tabarne

customer_reviews.title: Dog isn’t happy, but I am!
customer_reviews.text: I got a large for my 45lb dog. He’s cute but not happy about it. I haven’t had the chance to test it out in the rain yet, but it is a great material and fits him well. There is a belly strap and then two leg loops that keep it in place. I just wish the head hole was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: 100%, good for rain and chemical repellant
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Bought this for my service dog for rainy days on campus and chem lab (university) and it’s perfect! Great material, strong stitching, great color and reflective strips. It also has two elastic strips inside to loop your dogs hind legs through so it doesn’t flip around. Great product, would 100% buy for my next dog!
customer_reviews.author: a.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice Doggy Raincoat
customer_reviews.text: We love the color of this rain jacket on our golden retriever. However, I think a few areas could be improved. The straps for the back legs may work better if they were adjustable. It's a little loose and sometimes slides to one side. The hood slips back but I don't think that can be helped with the shape of a dog's head.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and it's exactly what I needed; and actually what I expected. Easy to put on and take off. Did need to add some velcro attaching material onto the coat so I could tighten up the strap, but no big deal. Once I did that, it fit my dog perfectly. Ready for a rainy day now.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Practical and cute!
customer_reviews.text: My golden looks SO FREAKIN CUTE in this coat!! Everyone gushes over him when they see. Most importantly - it keeps him nice and dry on rainy Seattle walks. The two elastic bands for the back legs keep it in place. The hood could be a little bigger, it slips off my dogs ears. Pretty much the only downfall. Overall really like it though!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

product_meta.title: NACOCO Large Dog Raincoat Adjustable Pet Water Proof Clothes Lightweight Rain Jacket Poncho Hoodies with Strip Reflective…
feature_bullets: PROFESSINAL MATERIAL: Made of professinal outdoor material with high waterproof and high brethable quality,no harm and let your pet keep dry.
CONVENIENCE: Use elastic leg straps and adjustable belly strap for a secure and comfortable fit.
DESIGNE: There is a reflective type on back ensure your pets can be seen at night/in the dark.
FUNCTION: Dog raincoat can help your pets keep dry and comfortable in the outdoors or in wet weather.
Size XL: Back length23.62-27.55", Chest circumference 29.92-33.07", Neck circumference 18.5-20.47".

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
